txt.en: Strange, monstrous spiders have crept into Bree-land from the dark corners of Mirkwood, beyond the Misty Mountains in the east. Your courage will be tested against the spider infestation spreading through the forests and marshes of Bree-land.
You have taken the first step towards becoming a Spider-slayer of Bree-land.
You have achieved the title of Spider-slayer of Breel-land!
Spiders have become quite a threat of late in Bree-land, but your prowess against them is well known.
